title: Have the immigrants from developing and underdeveloped nations brought down the quality of living in first world countries? - Quora
tags: Immigration to the United States of America

response.answer_text: Mostly, they haven´t They often cover jobs that locals don´t want to do for various reasons. They diversified local culture and bring new ideas, moreover, the educated ones are most beneficial for local science and engineering. On the other hand, If they are not gradually integrated into the rest of the society, they could create ghettos, some of them do criminal activities (organized crime included). Unfortunately, there are also immigrants who are hostile to their host country, which provides them (among other things) better living conditions and in some cases even harms it in the interests of their home country.
